summary.span: 物件的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含中的物件控制項。The contains the objects in a control. 您可以擷取此類別透過控制項的執行個體屬性。You can retrieve an instance of this class through the control property. 集合會維護透過控制項的參考屬性。The collection maintains a reference to the control through the property. 為了改善效能，包含共用和非共用的資料列。To improve performance, a includes shared and unshared rows. 共用的資料列共用記憶體，以減少大型的記錄集的成本。Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set. 如果您的資料錄集非常大，您應該小心保留共用資料列的最大的。If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多載會加入為基礎的資料列的。The overload adds rows that are based on the of the . 新的資料列被共用的話。The new row is shared, if possible. 請確認在指定的資料列屬性可共用及最佳的延展性。Be sure that the row specified in the property can be shared for best scalability. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 加入新的資料列時，不會自動排序控制項中的資料列。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added. 若要排序新的資料列至其正確的位置，請呼叫方法中的事件處理常式。To sort new rows into their correct position, call the method in a event handler. 您也可以在呼叫方法中的來排序資料列，當使用者修改資料格的事件處理常式。You might also want to call the method in a event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.
